form.label: DF - filesystems reporting based on nmon configuration data
form.description: This dashboard analyses the output of filesystems utilization statistics from the df command generated within the nmon_config data

search.query: | pivot NMON_Config Nmon_Config count(Nmon_Config) AS "count" SPLITROW host AS host FILTER OStype is "$OStype$" FILTER host is "$host-prefilter$" SORT 0 host ROWSUMMARY 0 COLSUMMARY 0 NUMCOLS 0 SHOWOTHER 1

table.title: DF - filesystems statistics for Linux OS

search.query: eventtype=nmon:config OStype=$Linux_OStype$ $host$ | rex field=_raw max_match=0 "BBB\w*,.*,\"(?<fs_df>[\w\/\-\_]*\s*\d*\s*\d*\s*\d*\s*\d*%\s*.*)\"" | table _time,host,fs_df | mvexpand fs_df | rex field=fs_df "(?<fs_dev>[\w\/\-\_]*)\s*(?<fs_1Mblocks>\d*)\s*(?<fs_used>\d*)\s*(?<fs_available>\d*)\s*(?<fs_usedpct>[\d|\.]*)%\s*(?<fs_mount>.*)" | stats latest(fs_dev) AS fs_dev, latest(fs_1Mblocks) AS fs_1Mblocks, latest(fs_used) AS fs_used, latest(fs_available) AS fs_available, latest(fs_usedpct) AS fs_usedpct, latest(_time) AS reporting_date by host,fs_mount | where fs_1Mblocks>0 | search NOT (fs_mount="/run" OR fs_mount="/run/*" OR fs_mount="/dev" OR fs_mount="/dev/*" OR fs_mount="/proc" OR fs_mount="/proc/*" OR fs_mount="/sys" OR fs_mount="/sys/*") | search fs_mount="$fs-prefilter$" | eval reporting_date=strftime(reporting_date, "%d/%m/%Y %H:%M") | sort limit=0 host,fs_mount | addcoltotals fs_1Mblocks,fs_used,fs_available labelfield=host | eval fs_usedpct=if(isnull(fs_usedpct), round(fs_used/fs_1Mblocks*100,2), fs_usedpct) | rename reporting_date AS "Last reporting date (mm/dd/Y HH:MM)"

table.title: DF - filesystems statistics for AIX OS

search.query: eventtype=nmon:config OStype=$AIX_OStype$ $host$ | rex field=_raw max_match=0 "BBB\w*,.*df.*,\"(?<fs_df>[\w\/\-\_]*\s*[\d|\.]*\s*[\d|\.]*\s*[\d|\.]*%\s*[\d|\.]*\s*[\d|\.]*%\s*[\w\/\-\_]*)\"" | table _time,host,fs_df | mvexpand fs_df | rex field=fs_df "(?<fs_dev>[\w\/\-\_]*)\s*(?<fs_MBblocks>[\d|\.]*)\s*(?<fs_free>[\d|\.]*)\s*(?<fs_usedpct>[\d|\.]*)%\s*(?<fs_inode_used>[\d|\.]*)\s*(?<fs_inode_usedpct>[\d|\.]*)%\s*(?<fs_mount>[\w\/\-\_]*)" | fields - fs_df | stats latest(fs_*) AS "fs_*", latest(_time) AS reporting_date by host,fs_mount | where fs_MBblocks>0 | search fs_mount="$fs-prefilter$" | eval reporting_date=strftime(reporting_date, "%d/%m/%Y %H:%M") | sort limit=0 host,fs_mount | addcoltotals fs_MBblocks,fs_free,fs_inode_used labelfield=host | eval fs_used=(fs_MBblocks-fs_free) | eval fs_usedpct=if(isnull(fs_usedpct), round(fs_used/fs_MBblocks*100,2), fs_usedpct)

table.title: DF - filesystems statistics for Solaris OS

search.query: eventtype=nmon:config OStype=$Solaris_OStype$ $host$ | rex field=_raw max_match=0 "BBB\w*,.*df.*,\"(?<fs_df>[\w\/\-\_]*\s*[\d|\.]*\w\s*[\d|\.]*\w\s*[\d|\.]*\w\s*[\d|\.]*%\s*[\w\/\-\_]*)" | table _time,host,fs_df | mvexpand fs_df | rex field=fs_df "(?<fs_dev>[\w\/\-\_]*)\s*(?<fs_size>[\d|.]*)(?<fs_size_unity>\w)\s*(?<fs_used>[\d|.]*)(?<fs_used_unity>\w)\s*(?<fs_available>[\d|.]*)(?<fs_available_unity>\w)\s*(?<fs_capacity_usedpct>[\d|\.]*)%\s*(?<fs_mount>[\w\/\-\_]*)" | eval fs_size=if(fs_size_unity="G", fs_size*1024, fs_size), fs_used=if(fs_used_unity="G", fs_used*1024, fs_used), fs_available=if(fs_available_unity="G", fs_available*1024, fs_available) | fields _time,host,fs_mount,fs_dev,* | fields - fs_df | stats latest(fs_*) AS "fs_*", latest(_time) AS reporting_date by host,fs_mount | where fs_available>0 | search NOT (fs_dev="swap") | search fs_mount="$fs-prefilter$" | eval reporting_date=strftime(reporting_date, "%d/%m/%Y %H:%M") | sort limit=0 host,fs_mount | addcoltotals fs_size,fs_used,fs_available labelfield=host | eval fs_capacity_usedpct=if(isnull(fs_capacity_usedpct), round(fs_used/fs_available*100,2), fs_capacity_usedpct) | fields host,fs_dev,fs_mount,fs_available,fs_capacity_usedpct,fs_size,fs_used,reporting_date | rename reporting_date AS "Last reporting date (mm/dd/Y HH:MM)", fs_available AS fs_available_MB, fs_capacity_usedpct AS fs_capacity_used_PCT, fs_size AS fs_size_MB, fs_used AS fs_used_MB
